          <title>
            <string language="en">The effect of gravity on the growth direction of seedling roots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt von Schwerkraft auf der 
Wachstumrichtung der Sämlingwurzeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la pesanteur sur la direction de 
croissance des racines de jeune plante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da gravidade no sentido do crescimento de
raizes do seedling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto di gravità sul senso di sviluppo delle 
radici del semenzale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση της βαρύτητας στην κατεύθυνση αύξησης των 
ριζών σποροφύτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la gravedad en la dirección del 
crecimiento de las raíces de la planta de semillero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment which determines the growth direction of roots when four seedlings are planted in different positions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">roots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">position</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seedling</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Experiment, welches 
die Wachstumrichtung der Wurzeln feststellt, wenn vier Sämlinge in 
den unterschiedlichen Positionen errichtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à une expérience ce 
qui détermine la direction de croissance des racines quand quatre 
jeunes plantes sont plantées dans différentes positions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a uma experiência qual 
determina o sentido do crescimento das raizes quando quatro seedlings 
são plantados em posições diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un esperimento 
quale determina il senso di sviluppo delle radici quando quattro 
semenzali sono piantati nelle posizioni differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που 
καθορίζει την κατεύθυνση αύξησης των ριζών όταν φυτεύονται 
τέσσερα σπορόφυτα στις διαφορετικές θέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a experimento cuál 
determina la dirección del crecimiento de raíces cuando cuatro 
plantas de semillero se plantan en diversas posiciones.</string>
          </description>
